title: Three killed in separate incidents in Balochistanâ€™s Nasirabad district - Pakistan - DAWN.COM
content:
DERA MURAD JAMALI: Two people, including a woman, were killed in separate incidents in Nasirabad district, while a bullet-riddled body was recovered in Panjgur on Saturday, police said.

In the first incident, unidentified armed men opened fire on a property dealer in Dera Murad Jamali and fled the scene. The deceased was identified as Ali Hassan Khokar, who had sustained multiple bullet wounds and died on the spot.

In another incident, a man allegedly strangled his wife to death in the name of honour in Goth Sharan, located in the Mangoli area of Nasirabad district. The suspect fled after committing the crime.

In the Shahukan area of Panjgur, residents alerted police after discovering an unattended body. The deceased was identified as Parvez, a resident of Shopatan, Chitkan.

Published in Dawn, July 13th, 2025
